data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schmidt, B. Christian, Sullivan, J. Bolling (2018): Three species in one: a revision of Clemensiaalbata Packard (Erebidae, Arctiinae, Lithosiini). ZooKeys 788: 39-55, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.788.26048, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.788.26048
